name: Idle Bomber - Idle & Clicker
description:
Boom! Boom! Boom!

Idle Bomber - Idle & Clicker Bomber Game is a idle and clicker game, where you need to explode bombs to clear the level without any squares!

You can play the game in any place, work, school, in front of your favorite tv show, you just need tap and select the bombs that you need!

FEATURES:
• 20+ bombs
• 150+ levels
• Boost to improve your gameplay!
• Prestige bombs

HOW TO PLAY:
• Tap in any place of screen to explode nearby squares
• Select bombs that you need
• Upgrade your current bombs
• Get prestige bombs to upgrade your game

SAY HELLO
We are constantly working hard on making the “Idle Bomber - Idle & Clicker Bomber Game” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “Idle Bomber - Idle & Clicker Bomber” game, do not forget to rate us on app store and share among your friends.
